A

alexandria() - Method in class com.github.macgregor.alexandria.maven.AlexandriaMojo

AlexandriaMojo - Class in com.github.macgregor.alexandria.maven
Base class which handles most of the work of mapping Maven input parameters to an initialized Alexandria context.
